title: Asking to set up nodes environment to get pre-regenesis  generation 1 , 2 and 3( Pre 23 June 2021 history , From Jan 2021, till June 2021) raw block data.

labels.name: C-question
labels.description: User questions that are neither feature requests nor bug reports

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

As @smartcontracts mentioned here (https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/3933) , 
Vanila geth version v1.9.10 isn't suitable to parse `pre-regenesis  generation 1 ~3` block data. 
(Ref Doc : https://community.optimism.io/docs/useful-tools/explorers/#pre-23-june-2021-history )


So I have starting to trace history how was going on about optimism-nodes had deployed. 
Below is my theory. 
1.  About generation 1 ( Pre 23 June 2021 history , From Jan 2021, till April 2021); 
- At those time, archived geth had used ( repo : https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/go-ethereum) 
- And DTL role would be a  https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism-ts-services repo in my guess. 
So In case of suitable to parse generation 1 block data, archive geth version v0.1.0 is good to go? or 0.2.0 would be better? 

2.  About generation 2 ( Pre 23 June 2021 history , From April 2021, till May 2021);  
- I don't think that aforementioned archive geth used, But assure that regenesis repo gave me some hint about this. 
CTC contract about this one was deployed in this tx ( https://etherscan.io/tx/0x1c20c2ee279bfa7446fd7117b4b147cb2709f581a8052fa66276df2d1af3467b) 
- So based on the this suitable to parse generation `2` block data, archive geth version v0.1.0 is good to go? or 0.2.0 would be better?  v0.2.0 was released at the `Apr 9, 2021` so might be matched but I'm not sure. 
- One thing that makes me hesitated is this commit (https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/commit/925675dd920d1c66a4ae0410b454bc757f7882ed) . 
Based on this, Looks like suitable optimism-geth would be the this version ( https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/releases/tag/%40eth-optimism%2Fl2geth%400.2.6) 

3. About generation 3 ( Pre 23 June 2021 history , From May 2021, till June 2021);  
- In here, I'm so depressed that no idea, because this version suitable to parse generation 3 block data but not sure. 
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/releases/tag/%40eth-optimism%2Fl2geth%400.4.8


Please let me know my guesses are correct. 

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
5. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
